title: Digital Marketing Mastery
description: Learn practical digital marketing skills to grow brands, run social media campaigns, and analyse performance. Perfect for students, graduates, and young entrepreneurs who want to boost their career or start an online business.
shortDescription: Master social media marketing, SEO, content creation, email marketing and analytics to grow your business online.
whatYouWillLearn: Social media marketing strategy (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok)
Content creation with Canva & Figma
SEO, email marketing, and analytics
Personal and business branding online
Running a mini digital campaign project
certification: Verified Elimu Space Digital Marketing Certificate
outcome: Gain industry-ready digital marketing skills and a verified portfolio to start freelancing, secure jobs, or grow a business.

title: Graphic Design & Branding
description: Learn to create professional visuals for social media, marketing, and branding. This course equips students, graduates, and young entrepreneurs with practical design skills that can be used for freelancing or business promotion.
shortDescription: Master design principles, typography, color theory and create stunning visuals using industry-standard tools.
whatYouWillLearn: Basics of graphic design & visual communication
Designing posts, flyers, logos, and social media content
Using Canva, Figma, and Adobe tools
Colour theory, typography, and layout principles
Portfolio project to showcase your work
certification: Verified Elimu Space Graphic Design Certificate
outcome: Gain industry-ready graphic design skills, a verified portfolio, and the confidence to freelance or grow your business visually.

title: Entrepreneurship & Business Skills
description: Learn how to start, manage, and grow a business from idea to reality. This course equips students, graduates, and young entrepreneurs with practical business skills, financial literacy, and strategies to secure funding and attract customers.
shortDescription: Learn to start and scale your business in Tanzania. From idea validation to funding, marketing and growth strategies.
whatYouWillLearn: Business idea generation & validation
Business model creation & planning
Financial literacy, budgeting, bookkeeping
Sales, marketing, and customer management
Pitching ideas & accessing grants or investors
Capstone project: Develop a mini business plan
outcome: Gain practical entrepreneurship skills, a verified business plan, and the confidence to start your own venture or scale existing projects.

title: Finance Essentials
description: Learn how to manage personal and business finances effectively. This course equips students, graduates, and young entrepreneurs with practical money management skills to make smart financial decisions, save, invest, and grow income.
shortDescription: Build a strong financial foundation. Learn budgeting, saving, investing and money management skills.
whatYouWillLearn: Basics of personal finance and budgeting
Managing business finances and bookkeeping
Saving strategies and investment fundamentals
Understanding credit, loans, and digital financial tools
Financial planning for self-employment and entrepreneurship
outcome: Learners gain the skills to manage money wisely, plan financially for their careers or businesses, and make informed decisions for growth and sustainability.

title: Confident Communication
description: Learn how to communicate effectively in professional settings and deliver presentations that make an impact. This course equips students, graduates, and young entrepreneurs with practical skills to express ideas clearly, influence others, and succeed in interviews, meetings, or business settings.
shortDescription: Master professional communication, public speaking, and presentation skills for career and business success.
whatYouWillLearn: Professional verbal and written communication
Public speaking and presentation techniques
Persuasive communication for business and career growth
Body language, tone, and confidence building
Preparing and delivering impactful presentations
certification: Verified Elimu Space Communication Skills Certificate
outcome: Learners gain confidence and professionalism to communicate ideas effectively, impress employers, and succeed in business or work environments.

title: Career Launchpad
description: Learn how to create a winning CV, apply for jobs effectively, and excel in interviews. This course equips students, graduates, and job seekers with practical career readiness skills to increase employability and secure opportunities faster.
shortDescription: Master job application strategies, CV writing, interview techniques, and professional etiquette for career success.
whatYouWillLearn: Writing professional CVs and cover letters
Job application strategies and online applications
Interview preparation and techniques
Professional etiquette and workplace communication
Handling common interview questions confidently
certification: Verified Elimu Space Career Readiness Certificate
outcome: Learners gain the skills to present themselves professionally, impress employers, and secure job or internship opportunities efficiently.

title: Data Analytics Essentials
description: Learn to collect, analyze, and visualize data to make informed decisions. This course equips students, graduates, and young entrepreneurs with practical digital analytics skills that are highly demanded in today's job market and business environment.
shortDescription: Learn data analysis, visualization, machine learning and AI. Work with real-world datasets.
whatYouWillLearn: Basics of data collection and organization
Data analysis using Excel and Google Sheets
Creating visual reports with charts and dashboards
Introduction to Google Data Studio & basic Power BI
Making data-driven decisions for business or career growth
certification: Verified Elimu Space Data Analytics Certificate
outcome: Learners gain industry-relevant data skills and the confidence to analyse and present insights that support career growth, freelancing, or business decision-making.

title: Soft Skills & Leadership
description: Learn essential soft skills and leadership techniques to excel in the workplace or entrepreneurship. This course equips students, graduates, and young entrepreneurs with communication, teamwork, and problem-solving abilities that make them highly employable.
shortDescription: Develop essential leadership, communication, teamwork, and problem-solving skills for workplace success.
whatYouWillLearn: Effective communication and interpersonal skills
Leadership and team management
Critical thinking and problem-solving
Adaptability and growth mindset
Time management and productivity
outcome: Learners develop confidence, professionalism, and leadership abilities to succeed in careers, startups, or collaborative work environments.
